QuestData.Title: Ogre Abduction
QuestData.Description: There's no way the Gordunni made these. They're being supplied. Someone is giving them gifts of power, and we need to find out who.$B$BThe upper-class Gordok that guard Dire Maul will know more about this. Orhan is no doubt having you thin their numbers, but I'll need one alive.$B$BTake the orb back. It's similar to a Soulstone, so I've made some...adjustments. Hold it up in front of a weakened Gordok ogre, and once you've captured him, bring it back here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Modified Soulstone to capture a Gordok ogre.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, I can feel the whelp in there. Let's get him out and ask him some questions...
